title: Roger Miret from Agnostic Front
itunes:title: Roger Miret from Agnostic Front
description:
Episode 271 - An absolute banger of an episode today with the man, Roger Miret. He’s the vocalist for NYC hardcore stalwarts, Agnostic Front and recently an author! His new book is out next week and we got to chat with him about Dad life, what it’s like to write a book and being in prison. For a guy that’s done a million interviews over his life, he was incredibly open and honest about all aspects of his life. A real treat! Visit our friends over at No Echo for great features on punk, hardcore and all things heavy. Use our Amazon Affiliate Code to support the show!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
